parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token required to obtain more results. This parameter is not required in the first query. If the first query does not return all results, you can use the token that is returned from the first query in the next query to obtain more results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query available region IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID. To query the tags of multiple clusters, click **Add** to add cluster IDs.

> 

*   You must specify at least one of the `ResourceId.N` and `Tag.N.Key` parameters.

*   If you specify the `ResourceId.N` parameter, you can add a maximum of 50 cluster IDs at a time.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **cluster**.
